	.groups-tab .conversation-toolbar.rx-facade-show-groups  ul.toolset-left{display:block;}

	.sg-channel-content-widget .widget-content button{margin-{vb:stylevar left}:5px;padding-{vb:stylevar left}:2px !important;padding-{vb:stylevar right}:2px !important;}

}

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:search page</vb:comment>
.search-results-widget .conversation-toolbar.mobile-search-results {display: none;}
@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

	#advancedSearchFields{padding:0 !important;}
	#rx-tags-column{display:block !important;}
	.form-row-daterange div.field_column {width:300px;min-width:300px;}

	<vb:comment>
	/* search results - mobile view */
	/*
		***important note: existing desktop version of vb5 has layout issues
		if enough characters (19 chars or so) are added to keyword field, keywords control
		on search results page improperly positions search icon
	*/
  </vb:comment>
	.search-result-header .search-controls {margin-bottom:0px;}
	.search-controls .search-control-popup {margin-bottom:20px;display:block;margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0px;}
	.search-controls .search-control-popup .PopupContent {top:22px;}
	.search-controls .search-control-popup span{max-width:250px}
	.search-results-widget .widget-content,
	.search-results-widget .widget-content .search-result-header,
	.search-results-widget .widget-content  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper{display:block;float:none;clear:both}
	.search-results-widget .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .conversation-toolbar .toolset-left > li {margin-{vb:stylevar right}:5px;}
	.conversation-toolbar .toolset-left .sort-controls label{display:none;}
	.search-results-widget .conversation-toolbar.desktop .toolset-right {display: none;}
	.search-results-widget .conversation-toolbar.mobile-search-results {display: block;}

}

@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {

	<vb:comment>/* restyle all labels */</vb:comment>
	.add-search-fieldset .label_column
	{
		width:275px !important;
		height:18px !important;
		display:inline-block !important;
		clear:both !important;
		margin-top:20px !important;
		text-align:{vb:stylevar left};
		float:{vb:stylevar left};
	}

	<vb:comment>
	/* restyle all field columns */
	</vb:comment>
	.add-search-fieldset div.field_column{float:{vb:stylevar left};display:block;}
	.add-search-fieldset div.field_column label{float:{vb:stylevar left};max-width:250px;width:250px;}
	.add-search-fieldset div.field_column label input,
	.add-search-fieldset div.field_column label img{float:{vb:stylevar right};}

	<vb:comment>
	/* search header */
	</vb:comment>
	.search-fields-widget .widget-header{padding-{vb:stylevar left}:0px !important;}

	<vb:comment>
	/* search: keywords */
	/* restyle TITLE ONLY checkbox */
	</vb:comment>
	.form-row-keywords .field_column,.form-row-members .field_column{padding:0 !important;}
	.form-row-keywords .info_column,.form-row-members .info_column{padding:0 !important;clear:both !important;float:{vb:stylevar left};text-align:{vb:stylevar left};}
	<vb:comment>/* restyle SEARCH TIPS */</vb:comment>
	a.search-tips{margin-top:2px !important;}

	.form-row-daterange div.field_column label.date-from{float:{vb:stylevar left};}
	.form-row-daterange div.field_column label.date-to{float:{vb:stylevar left};margin:0px !important;}
	.form-row-daterange div.field_column label.date-lastvisit input{float:{vb:stylevar left};}

	<vb:comment>/* search page: tags */</vb:comment>
	.form_layout .form-fieldset .form_row.form-row-tags .field_column .tag-editor-wrapper .add-tag-link {top:0;}
	<vb:comment>/* search page: tags modal dialog */</vb:comment>
	.form-row-tags > .field_column{padding-bottom:0px !important;}

	<vb:comment>/* search page: date inputs */</vb:comment>
	.form-row-daterange .field_column .date-from,
	.form-row-daterange .field_column .date-to{float:{vb:stylevar right};margin-bottom:5px;}
	input.searchFields_from_date,
	input.searchFields_to_date {margin-{vb:stylevar left}:8px !important;width:150px !important;}

	<vb:comment>
	/* sort by, order */
	</vb:comment>
	.add-search-fieldset .form-row-sortby div.field_column{padding-bottom:0px !important;}
	.add-search-fieldset .label_column.sort-order{margin-top:0px !important;padding-top:0px !important;}
	.searchFields_order_field,.searchFields_order_direction{margin-bottom:5px;}

}

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:blogs page:incrementally shrink and remove elements</vb:comment>

<vb:comment>
/*
	As viewport shrinks the following breakpoints alter the display of, or hide,
	elements in the filter (conversation-toolbar) and blogs sub menu (ui-tabs-nav)

	@1150	reduce size of "All" button
	@1025	hide "Show:" label
	@860	hide "My Blog Posts" button in filter, hide "Member Blogs" link in blogs menu
	@767	parent container expands, re-display "My Blog Posts" button and "Show:" label

	note: These paths are specific to blogs and social groups in the path of a column with the
		style "l-col__fixed-6".	The l-col__fixed-6 class replaced the bootstrap class span4.
		This class makes these controls too small to display all elements at certain widths.
		To limit the number of regressions introduced (VBV-9543), find/replace was used here.

*/
</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:1150px) {

	<vb:comment>/* reduce size of "All" button */</vb:comment>
	.canvas-layout-row > .canvas-widget-list.l-col__fixed-6 > .canvas-widget >
	.widget-tabs-panel > .ui-widget-content > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper >
	.conversation-toolbar > .toolset-left button.showAll{min-width:50px;min-width:50px;}

}

@media only screen and (max-width:1025px) {

	<vb:comment>/* hide "Show:" label */</vb:comment>
	.canvas-layout-row > .canvas-widget-list.l-col__fixed-6 > .canvas-widget >
	.widget-tabs-panel > .ui-widget-content > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper >
	.conversation-toolbar > .toolset-left > li > .button-set > .b-button__text-primary {display:none;}

}

@media only screen and (max-width:860px) {

	<vb:comment>/* hide "My Blog Posts" button */</vb:comment>
	.canvas-layout-row > .canvas-widget-list.l-col__fixed-6 > .canvas-widget >
	.widget-tabs-panel > .ui-widget-content > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper >
	.conversation-toolbar > .toolset-left button.showMy{display:none;}

	<vb:comment>/* hide "Member Blogs" link */</vb:comment>
	.canvas-layout-row > .canvas-widget-list.l-col__fixed-6 > .canvas-widget >
	.widget-header > .module-title > .ui-widget-header > li > a[href="#memberblog-tab"]{display:none;}

}


@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

	<vb:comment>
	/* re-display "My Blog Posts" button and "Show:" label */
	</vb:comment>
	.canvas-layout-row > .canvas-widget-list.l-col__fixed-6 > .canvas-widget >
	.widget-tabs-panel > .ui-widget-content > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper >
	.conversation-toolbar > .toolset-left button.showMy{display:inline-block}
	.canvas-layout-row > .canvas-widget-list.l-col__fixed-6 > .canvas-widget >
	.widget-tabs-panel > .ui-widget-content > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper >
	.conversation-toolbar > .toolset-left > li > .button-set > .b-button__text-primary {display:inline-block;}

}

<vb:comment>
/*
	As viewport shrinks the following breakpoints alter the display of, or hide,
	elements in the filter (conversation-toolbar) and blogs sub menu (ui-tabs-nav)

	@1150	reduce size of "All" button
	@1025	hide "Show:" label
	@860	hide "My Blog Posts" button in filter, hide "Member Blogs" link in blogs menu
	@767	parent container expands, re-display "My Blog Posts" button and "Show:" label

	note: These paths are specific to blogs and social groups in the path of a column with the
		style "l-col__flex-6".	The l-col__flex-6 class replaced the bootstrap class span8.
		This class makes these controls too small to display all elements at certain widths.
		To limit the number of regressions introduced (VBV-9543), find/replace was used here.

*/
</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

	<vb:comment>/* re-display "My Blog Posts" button and "Show:" label */</vb:comment>
	.canvas-layout-row > .canvas-widget-list.l-col__flex-6 > .canvas-widget >
	.widget-tabs-panel > .ui-widget-content > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper >
	.conversation-toolbar > .toolset-left button.showMy{display:inline-block}
	.canvas-layout-row > .canvas-widget-list.l-col__flex-6 > .canvas-widget >
	.widget-tabs-panel > .ui-widget-content > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper >
	.conversation-toolbar > .toolset-left > li > .button-set > .b-button__text-primary {display:inline-block;}

}

@media only screen and (max-width:400px) {

	<vb:comment>/* reduce size of "All" button */</vb:comment>
	.canvas-layout-row > .canvas-widget-list.l-col__flex-6 > .canvas-widget >
	.widget-tabs-panel > .ui-widget-content > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper >
	.conversation-toolbar > .toolset-left button.showAll{min-width:75px;min-width:75px;}

}

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:conversation buttons</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

	.post-controls.h-right .editCtrl span.icon,
	.post-controls.h-right .flagCtrl span.icon,
	.post-controls.h-right .commentCtrl span.icon,
	.post-controls.h-right .quoteCtrl span.icon,
	.post-controls.h-right .voteCtrl span.icon,
	.post-controls .infractionCtrl .vb-icon,
	.post-controls.h-right .editCtrl span.vb-icon,
	.post-controls.h-right .flagCtrl span.vb-icon,
	.post-controls.h-right .commentCtrl span.vb-icon,
	.post-controls.h-right .quoteCtrl span.vb-icon,
	.post-controls.h-right .voteCtrl span.vb-icon {display: none;}

	<vb:comment>
	/* added button style for social group footer section */
	</vb:comment>
	.social-groups-widget .list-item-footer > .replylike_count li a,
	.social-groups-widget .widget-footer a,
	.post-controls.h-right .editCtrl span.label,
	.post-controls.h-right .flagCtrl span.label,
	.post-controls.h-right .commentCtrl span.label,
	.post-controls.h-right .quoteCtrl span.label,
	.post-controls.h-right .voteCtrl span.label,
	.post-controls .infractionCtrl .label,
	.post-links a.goto-post{
		color:#fff;
		margin: 0 1px;
		background-color:#2379B5;
		-moz-border-radius: 2px;
		-webkit-border-radius: 2px;
		border-radius: 2px;
		cursor: pointer;
		position: relative;
		text-align: center;
		display:inline-block;
		height: 18px;
		line-height: 18px;
		padding: 0 1em;
		outline: 0;
		text-decoration: none;
	}

	.social-groups-widget .list-item-footer > .replylike_count li a{margin-bottom:5px;padding:0 0.5em;}
	.social-groups-widget .widget-footer a {margin-top:5px;padding:0 0.5em;}
	.social-groups-widget .list-container .list-item .list-item-footer .replylike_count li{margin-{vb:stylevar right}:2px;}
	.social-groups-widget .widget-content .list-item-header .author.h-left{margin-{vb:stylevar right}:5px;}

	.post-controls.h-right{margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0;}

	<vb:comment>
	/* remove link and divider(s) */
	</vb:comment>
	.post-links .see-link.more{display:none}
	.post-links span{display:none}

	<vb:comment>
	/* set goto post text color to white */
	</vb:comment>
	.post-links a.goto-post{color:#fff !important;}

	<vb:comment>
	/* set quote text color to orange */
	</vb:comment>
	.post-footer-wrapper .post-footer .post-controls .quoteCtrl.selected .label {color: {vb:stylevar post_controls_quote_active_text_color} !important;}

	.post-controls.h-right{float:{vb:stylevar left};margin-{vb:stylevar left}:8px !important;}
	.post-controls.h-right > li {margin-{vb:stylevar left}:3px  !important;}
	.post-controls.h-right .postcount span.icon,.post-controls.h-right .postcount span.vb-icon{display:none;}

	<vb:comment>
	/* resize comment textarea box to fit within container and remove container margins */
	</vb:comment>
	.list-item-body-wrapper div.comment-entry-box{margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0 !important;margin-{vb:stylevar right}:0  !important;}
}

<vb:comment>
/* reducing padding for small viewport size to allow more room for footer buttons */
</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:479px) {

	.social-groups-widget .list-item-footer > .replylike_count li a,
	.social-groups-widget .widget-footer a,
	.post-controls.h-right .editCtrl span.label,
	.post-controls.h-right .flagCtrl span.label,
	.post-controls.h-right .commentCtrl span.label,
	.post-controls.h-right .quoteCtrl span.label,
	.post-controls.h-right .voteCtrl span.label,
	.post-links a.goto-post{
		padding: 0 .8em;
	}
}

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:contact us page</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

	#pagetitle,
	form.vbform.block .blockhead,
	form.vbform.block .blockbody .blocksubhead{margin-top:10px;}

	form.vbform.block  .blockfoot input{
		margin-top:10px;
		margin-bottom:10px;
		background-color:#2379B5;
		color:#fff;
		-moz-border-radius:2px;
		-webkit-border-radius:2px;
		border-radius:2px;
		cursor: pointer;
		border: {vb:stylevar button_primary_border};
	}

	.contactusFields input,.contactusFields textarea{max-width:240px;}
	.contactusFields_other_subject{display:block;margin-top:10px;}

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:breadcrumbs page section</vb:comment>

<vb:comment>
/* Fix for a weird main CSS rule that fails to catch the
* unlinked last breadcrumb. */
</vb:comment>
#breadcrumbs .ellipsis {
  line-height: 16px !important;
}

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
	#breadcrumbs {
		margin: 0;
		padding-top: 10px;
		clear: both;
	}
}

@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
	#breadcrumbs {
		margin: 0;
		padding: 10px 10px 0 10px;
	}
}



<vb:comment>responsive:css:video resizing</vb:comment>

.videocontainer {
	position: relative;
	overflow: hidden;
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 320px) {
    .videocontainer .restrain, {
        height: 200px;
    }
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 568px) {
    .videocontainer .restrain {
        height: 348px;
    }
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 695px) {
    .videocontainer .restrain {
        height: 360px;
    }
}

#youtube-video{
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
}

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:nav tabs to select:click event registered and handled by rx.ListToSelect object</vb:comment>
<vb:comment>
/*
	This file styles nav tabs and select boxes to hide/show depending on viewport size

	Home
	Blogs
	Profile
	Social Groups
	Profile:subscriptions
*/

/*
	At larger viewport set default styles: show tab nav and hide select box
*/

/* Profile page : subscriptions */
</vb:comment>
.subscriptionsContainer > .subscribeTabs > ul.widget-tabs-nav {display:block;background-color:blue}
.subscriptionsContainer > .subscribeTabs > div.widget-tabs-nav {display:none;}

<vb:comment>
/* activity stream -- home */ /* blog posts */ /* social group tabs */
</vb:comment>
div.activity-stream-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > ul {display:inline-block;}
div.activity-stream-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > select {display:none;}

<vb:comment>
/* activity stream -- main forum */
</vb:comment>
div.channel-content-widget > .widget-content > .channel-conversation-list-wrapper > .widget-tabs-nav > ul.ui-tabs-nav {display:inline-block;}
div.channel-content-widget > .widget-content > .channel-conversation-list-wrapper > .widget-tabs-nav > select {display:none;margin:5px 0 5px 5px;}

<vb:comment>
/* activity stream -- main forum(else) */
</vb:comment>
div.channel-content-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > ul {display:inline-block;}
div.channel-content-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > select {display:none;margin:5px 0 5px 5px;}

<vb:comment>
/* activity stream -- blog */
</vb:comment>
div.blog-channel-content-widget > .widget-content > .channel-conversation-list-wrapper > .widget-tabs-nav > ul.ui-tabs-nav {display:inline-block;}
div.blog-channel-content-widget > .widget-content > .channel-conversation-list-wrapper  > select {display:none;}

<vb:comment>
/* activity stream -- blog(else) */
</vb:comment>
div.blog-channel-content-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > ul {display:inline-block;}
div.blog-channel-content-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > select {display:none;}

<vb:comment>
/* activity stream -- blog new entry */
</vb:comment>
div.blog-channel-content-widget > .channel-conversation-list-wrapper > .widget-tabs-nav > ul {display:inline-block;}
div.blog-channel-content-widget > .channel-conversation-list-wrapper > .widget-tabs-nav > select {display:none;}

<vb:comment>
/* profile nav tabs */
/* profile is different from the rest ...
because the tab navs don't reside in the widget header
*/
</vb:comment>
div.profile-widget > .widget-content > .profile-container > .widget-tabs > ul.widget-tabs-nav {display:block;}
div.profile-widget > .widget-content > .profile-container > .widget-tabs > div.widget-tabs-nav {display:none;width:100%;}
div.profile-widget > .widget-content > .profile-container > .widget-tabs > div.widget-tabs-nav > select {margin:5px 0 5px 5px;}


<vb:comment>
/*
	At this breakpoint hide tab nav and show select box
*/
</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

  <vb:comment>
	/* give the select some space within its container */
	</vb:comment>
	#content .widget-tabs .widget-tabs-nav {
	  height: auto !important;
  }
  <vb:comment>
  /* Gregg's note:
   *
   * Trying to get around explicitly setting heights on elements like
   * the container for the select box. Instead of setting a height, better
   * to set padding and let the container determine its own height based
   * on whatever elements are inside it.
   */
</vb:comment>
	#content .widget-tabs .widget-tabs-nav .module-title {
	  padding: 3px;
	  height: auto !important;
	  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
	  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
	  box-sizing: border-box;
  }
  <vb:comment>
	/* #content .widget-tabs .widget-tabs-nav .module-title select{margin-top:3px;margin-{vb:stylevar left}:3px;} /* home */
	/* #content .widget-tabs .widget-tabs-nav select{margin-top:3px;margin-{vb:stylevar left}:3px;} /* forum */


	/* widget_subscription.xml */
	/* Profile page : subscriptions */
	</vb:comment>
	.subscriptionsContainer > .subscribeTabs > ul.widget-tabs-nav {display:none;}
	.subscriptionsContainer > .subscribeTabs > div.widget-tabs-nav {display:block;background-color:red}
	.subscriptionsContainer > .subscribeTabs > div.widget-tabs-nav > select {margin-{vb:stylevar left}:3px;margin-bottom:3px;}


<vb:comment>
	/* widget_4.xml,widget_bloghome.xml,widget_sghome.xml */
		/* hide activity stream tabs, show activity stream select box -- home */
		/* hide blog tabs, show blog posts select box -- blogs */
		/* hide social group tabs, show select box */
		</vb:comment>
		div.activity-stream-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > ul {display:none;}
		div.activity-stream-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > select {display:inline-block;}

	<vb:comment>
	/* widget_5.xml */
		/* hide activity stream tabs, show activity stream select box -- main forum */
	</vb:comment>
		div.channel-content-widget > .widget-content > .channel-conversation-list-wrapper > .widget-tabs-nav > ul.ui-tabs-nav {display:none !important;}
		div.channel-content-widget > .widget-content > .channel-conversation-list-wrapper > .widget-tabs-nav > select {display:inline-block;}

		<vb:comment>
		/* hide activity stream tabs, show activity stream select box -- main forum (else) */
		</vb:comment>
		div.channel-content-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > ul {display:none;}
		div.channel-content-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > select {display:inline-block;}


	<vb:comment>
	/* widget_blogchanneldisplay.xml */
		/* hide activity stream tabs, show activity stream select box -- blog */
	</vb:comment>
		div.blog-channel-content-widget > .widget-content > .channel-conversation-list-wrapper > .widget-tabs-nav > ul.ui-tabs-nav {display:none;}
		div.blog-channel-content-widget > .widget-content > .channel-conversation-list-wrapper > select {display:inline-block;}

		<vb:comment>
		/* hide activity stream tabs, show activity stream select box -- blog (else) */
		</vb:comment>
		div.blog-channel-content-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > ul {display:none;}
		div.blog-channel-content-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > select {display:inline-block;}

		<vb:comment>
	/* widget_blognewentry.xml -- note: these have vb comments around them at this time */

		/* hide activity stream tabs, show activity stream select box -- blog new entry */
	</vb:comment>
		div.blog-channel-content-widget > .channel-conversation-list-wrapper > .widget-tabs-nav > ul {display:none;}
		div.blog-channel-content-widget > .channel-conversation-list-wrapper > .widget-tabs-nav > select {display:inline-block;}


		.activity-stream-widget select,
		div.widget-tabs-nav > select {
			font-size: 14px;
			outline: 0;
			background: url(data:image/png;base64,) no-repeat 99% 50%;
			-webkit-appearance: none;
			-moz-box-sizing: border-box;
			-webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
			-ms-box-sizing: border-box;
			-o-box-sizing: border-box;
			box-sizing: border-box;
			border: 0;
			border-{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
			padding: 0.25em 24px 0.25em 10px;
			-webkit-border-radius: 0;
			-moz-border-radius: 0;
			border-radius: 0;
			display: inline-block;
		}


		body.ie .activity-stream-widget select,
		html.firefox .activity-stream-widget select {
			background: none !important;
		}

<vb:comment>
		/* hide activity stream tabs, show activity stream select box -- blog entry (else) */
		/* remmed out: blog (else) handles this one
		div.blog-channel-content-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > ul {display:none;}
		div.blog-channel-content-widget > .widget-header > .module-title.h-left > select {display:inline-block;}
		*/
</vb:comment>

<vb:comment>
	/* profile nav tabs */
</vb:comment>
	div.profile-widget > .widget-content > .profile-container > .widget-tabs > ul.widget-tabs-nav {display:none;}
	div.profile-widget > .widget-content > .profile-container > .widget-tabs > div.widget-tabs-nav {display:inline-block;}

}

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:modal windows</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

	.prompt-dialog-container .ui-dialog-titlebar{border:none;}

}

<vb:comment>
/* Photo Carousel: iPhone landscape */
</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {

<vb:comment>
	.slideshow {padding:0px !important;background:{vb:stylevar photo_background};}
	.slideshow .slideshow-wrapper > .jcarousel-clip-horizontal {width:421px;height:200px;}
	.slideshow .thumbnails > .jcarousel-clip-horizontal {width:344px;height:52px;}/*width:234px*/
	.slideshow .slideshow-wrapper > .jcarousel-clip .jcarousel-item {width:421px;height:200px;}
	.slideshow .thumbnails > .jcarousel-clip .jcarousel-item {width:70px;height:52px;overflow:hidden;}
	.slideshow .jcarousel-item .image {max-width:300px;max-height:200px;width:auto;height:auto;}

	body > div.slideshow-dialog{width:421px !important;height:357px !important;}
	body > div.slideshow-dialog > div.slideshow {height:357px !important;width:421px !important;}
	div.slideshow-wrapper > div.jcarousel-next,div.slideshow-wrapper > div.jcarousel-prev {top:80px !important;}
	body > div.slideshow-dialog > div.slideshow-wrapper.jcarousel-container.jcarousel-container-horizontal > div.jcarousel-clip.jcarousel-clip-horizontal
	body > div.slideshow-dialog > div.slideshow-wrapper.jcarousel-container.jcarousel-container-horizontal > div.jcarousel-clip.jcarousel-clip-horizontal > ul > li.jcarousel-item,
	body > div.slideshow-dialog > div.slideshow-wrapper.jcarousel-container.jcarousel-container-horizontal > div.jcarousel-clip.jcarousel-clip-horizontal > ul > li.jcarousel-item > div.image-wrapper{width:421px !important;}
</vb:comment>

}

<vb:comment>
/* Photo Carousel: iPhone portrait */
</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:320px) {

<vb:comment>
	.slideshow {padding:0px !important;background:{vb:stylevar photo_background};}
	.slideshow .slideshow-wrapper > .jcarousel-clip-horizontal {width:311px;height:200px;}
	.slideshow .thumbnails > .jcarousel-clip-horizontal {width:250px;height:52px;}/*234*/
	.slideshow .slideshow-wrapper > .jcarousel-clip .jcarousel-item {width:311px;height:200px;}
	.slideshow .thumbnails > .jcarousel-clip .jcarousel-item {width:70px;height:52px;overflow:hidden;}
	.slideshow .jcarousel-item .image {max-width:300px;max-height:200px;width:auto;height:auto;}

	body > div.slideshow-dialog{width:311px !important;height:357px !important;}
	body > div.slideshow-dialog > div.slideshow {height:357px !important;width:311px !important;}
	div.slideshow-wrapper > div.jcarousel-next,div.slideshow-wrapper > div.jcarousel-prev {top:80px !important;}
	body > div.slideshow-dialog > div.slideshow-wrapper.jcarousel-container.jcarousel-container-horizontal > div.jcarousel-clip.jcarousel-clip-horizontal
	body > div.slideshow-dialog > div.slideshow-wrapper.jcarousel-container.jcarousel-container-horizontal > div.jcarousel-clip.jcarousel-clip-horizontal > ul > li.jcarousel-item,
	body > div.slideshow-dialog > div.slideshow-wrapper.jcarousel-container.jcarousel-container-horizontal > div.jcarousel-clip.jcarousel-clip-horizontal > ul > li.jcarousel-item > div.image-wrapper{width:311px !important;}
</vb:comment>

}

<vb:comment>
 /* fix to addition of float:none to css_global.css.xml */
</vb:comment>
  @media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
	.canvas-layout-container .canvas-layout .canvas-layout-row.has-columns .canvas-widget-list{float:{vb:stylevar left};}
  }

<vb:comment>
 /* make all the Activity Stream tabs visible and prevent the Forum tab content to bleed out of the available width when in the narrow 30% column */
</vb:comment>
  @media only screen and (max-width:1060px) {
  	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .widget-header,
  	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .widget-header,
  	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .widget-header .module-title,
  	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .widget-header .module-title {height:auto !important;}

	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget #forum-tab,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget #forum-tab,
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container th,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container th,
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container td,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container td {overflow:hidden;}

	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-forum,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-forum,
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-item .cell-forum,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-item .cell-forum {
		width:50%;
	}
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-topics,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-topics,
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-posts,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-posts,
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-item .topics-count,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-item .topics-count,
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-item .posts-count,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-item .posts-count {
		padding-{vb:stylevar left}:2px;
		padding-{vb:stylevar right}:2px;
		width:25%;
	}
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-topics,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-topics,
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-item .topics-count,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-item .topics-count {
		padding-{vb:stylevar left}:4px;
	}
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-posts,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-posts,
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-item .posts-count,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-item .posts-count {
		padding-{vb:stylevar right}:4px;
	}
	<vb:comment>
	/* Hide Last Post column */
	</vb:comment>
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-lastpost,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-lastpost,
	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-item .lastpost,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-item .lastpost {

  <vb:comment>
  	/* Add border to the right of the Posts column which is now the last column as a result of hiding the Last Post column */
  </vb:comment>
  	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-posts,
	#canvas-layout-narrow-wide .canvas-widget-list.section-0 .activity-stream-widget .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-posts {

  	}

	#canvas-layout-wide-narrow .canvas-widget-list.section-1 .activity-stream-widget.widget-tabs .widget-header.widget-tabs-nav .ui-tabs-nav,

<vb:comment>
	/* remove middle columns and widen outer columns for better iPhone portrait display */
</vb:comment>
	@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
		.topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-lastpost{min-width:150px !important;}
	}




	<vb:comment>
	/*
	 * Topic List
	 *
	 * We're in a transtional state to getting the CSS organized. For now, I'm grouping these .l-small rules
	 * here to go with the replace the max-width:479px media query they were a part of. VBV-9793
	 * These are .topic-list-container rules.
	 */
	</vb:comment>

	<vb:comment>/* Table */</vb:comment>
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container,
	.l-small .topic-list-container {
		display: block;
	}

	<vb:comment>/* Header row */</vb:comment>
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list-header,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list-header {
		display: block;
	}
	<vb:comment>/* Hide the title in search module results when display as topics is chosen */</vb:comment>
	.search-widget .topic-list-container .topic-list-header {
		display: none;
	}
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list-header .header-icons,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list-header .header-stats,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list-header .header-lastpost,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list-header .header-icons,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list-header .header-stats,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list-header .header-lastpost {
		display:none;
	}

	<vb:comment>/* Table rows */</vb:comment>
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list {
		display: block;
	}
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item {
		<vb:comment>/* Needed to position .cell-inlinemod-item */</vb:comment>
		display: block;
		position: relative;
		min-height: 50px;
	}

	<vb:comment>/* Base style for table cells */</vb:comment>
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-topic,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-count,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-lastpost,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-inlinemod-item,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-topic,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-count,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-lastpost,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-inlinemod-item {
		padding: 0 5px;
		display: block;
		-webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
		-moz-box-sizing: border-box;
		box-sizing: border-box;
		color: {vb:stylevar text_tertiary_color};
	}
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-count,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-lastpost,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-inlinemod-item,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list.sticky-list + .topic-list tr:first-child td.cell-count,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list.sticky-list + .topic-list tr:first-child td.cell-lastpost,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list.sticky-list + .topic-list tr:first-child td.cell-inlinemod-item,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-count,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-lastpost,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-inlinemod-item,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list.sticky-list + .topic-list tr:first-child td.cell-count,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list.sticky-list + .topic-list tr:first-child td.cell-lastpost,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list.sticky-list + .topic-list tr:first-child td.cell-inlinemod-item {
		border-top: none;
	}

	<vb:comment>/* Title cell */</vb:comment>
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-topic,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-topic {
		padding-top: 10px;
	}
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item .cell-topic .topic-wrapper,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item .cell-topic .topic-wrapper {
		-webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
		-moz-box-sizing: border-box;
		box-sizing: border-box;
		width:100%;
		font-size: 1.2em;
		line-height: 1.1em;
		margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
		margin-bottom: 2px;
		padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 45px;
		padding-{vb:stylevar right}: 22px;
	}
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item .cell-topic .topic-info,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item .cell-topic .topic-info {
		display: none;
	}
	.l-narrow-column .topic-avatar,
	.l-small .topic-avatar {
		position: absolute;
		top: 13px;
		{vb:stylevar left}: 8px;
	}

	<vb:comment>/* Icon cell */</vb:comment>
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-icons,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-icons {
		display:none;
	}

	<vb:comment>/* Count cell */</vb:comment>
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-count,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-count {
		font-size: 0.9em;
		padding-bottom: 2px;
		padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 50px;
	}
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-count .posts-count,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-count .views-count,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-count .votes-count,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-count .posts-count,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-count .views-count,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-count .votes-count {
		display: inline;
	}

	<vb:comment>/* Last post cell */</vb:comment>
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item td.cell-lastpost,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item td.cell-lastpost {
		font-size: 0.9em;
		padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 50px;
		padding-{vb:stylevar right}: 5px;
		padding-top: 0;
		padding-bottom: 10px;
	}
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-lastpost .avatar,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-lastpost .lastpost-by,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-lastpost .avatar,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-lastpost .lastpost-by {
		display: none;
	}
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-lastpost .post-date,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-lastpost .post-date {
		font-size: inherit;
		color: {vb:stylevar text_tertiary_color};
	}

	<vb:comment>/* Handle redirect, deleted, and unapproved */</vb:comment>
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item.redirect .cell-count,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item.redirect .cell-lastpost,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item.deleted .cell-count,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item.deleted .cell-lastpost,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item.unapproved .cell-count,
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item.unapproved .cell-lastpost,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item.redirect .cell-count,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item.redirect .cell-lastpost,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item.deleted .cell-count,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item.deleted .cell-lastpost,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item.unapproved .cell-count,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .topic-item.unapproved .cell-lastpost {
		display: none;
	}

	<vb:comment>/* Inline mod cell -- Note: inline moderation is completely hidden elsewhere in this file at the smallest screen sizes */</vb:comment>
	.l-narrow-column .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-inlinemod-item,
	.l-small .topic-list-container .topic-list .cell-inlinemod-item {
		padding-top: 10px;
		width: 30px;
		position: absolute;
		top: 3px;
		{vb:stylevar right}: 3px;
	}

	<vb:comment>/* END Topic List */</vb:comment>




	/*
	 * The statistics UI also uses the .table, .tr, and .td classes. We need !important here because the
	 * ".table .td" rule also uses !important for display: table-cell.
	 */
	.l-small .sg-statistics, .l-small .blogChannel-statistics{display:none !important;}


	<vb:comment>
	/* encapsulate debug info */
	</vb:comment>
	.l-small #debug-information {
		-webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
		-moz-box-sizing: border-box;
		box-sizing: border-box;
		overflow: auto;
		width: 280px;
		max-width: 280px;
	}


<vb:comment>
	/* reset size of slider */
</vb:comment>
	@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
		html.touch .ui-timepicker-div .ui_tpicker_hour .ui-slider-horizontal,
		html.touch .ui-timepicker-div .ui_tpicker_minute .ui-slider-horizontal{width:42%;}
	}

<vb:comment>
	/* fix for filter 1px off (found on home,blogs,groups)*/
</vb:comment>
	@media only screen and (max-width:479px) {

		.activity-stream-widget .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .conversation-toolbar{margin-top:-1px;}

	}

	<vb:comment>
	/* fix for responsive display of profile image upload form */
	</vb:comment>
	@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

		#editProfilePhotoDlg .profile-img-option-container .profile-img-option-field > input{width:90% !important;margin-bottom:10px;}

	}


	<vb:comment>
	/* fix for responsive display of group icon upload form */

	/* only display radio button and label if fileinput class exists in html element */
	/* see 'New Topic form' section above */
	</vb:comment>
	.rx-modal-label.blog-form-row{display:inline;display:inline-block;}
	.rx-modal-label.blog-form-row.rx-fileinput{display:none;}
	html.fileinput .rx-modal-label.blog-form-row.rx-fileinput{display:inline;display:inline-block;}

	.rx-modal.ui-dialog {border-radius: 3px 3px 3px 3px;padding:0;}

	.rx-modal.ui-widget-header {
		background: none;
		border:none;
		color:none;
		font-weight:none;
	}

	.rx-modal.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar {
		background: {vb:stylevar popup_header_background};
		border:{vb:stylevar popup_border};
		border-radius:3px 3px 0 0;
		border-width:0 0 1px;
		font-size:18px;
		height:30px;
		line-height:30px;
	}

	.rx-modal.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar .ui-dialog-titlebar-close{display:none;}
	.rx-modal-label.blog-form-row .row-title{float:{vb:stylevar left};width:20px;}

	.rx-modal .blog-form-row .row-content{width:auto;}
	.rx-modal input[type="radio"]{margin:0;}

	@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

		.rx-modal{height:auto;}
		.rx-modal .sgicon-upload-form .blog-form-row{margin:0;}
		.rx-modal .sgicon-upload-form > div{margin-top:10px;}
		.rx-modal .sgicon-upload-form .rx-modal-label.blog-form-row{margin-top:30px;}

		.rx-modal .sgIconUploader{margin: 15px 2px 15px 2px;overflow:hidden;padding:6px !important;}
		.rx-modal .sgIconUploader h4{margin-bottom:10px;}
		.rx-modal .btnSGIconUrlSubmit{margin-bottom:10px;}

		.rx-modal-label.blog-form-row .row-title input{margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0;}
		.rx-modal-label.blog-form-row .row-content{float:{vb:stylevar left};width:250px;}
		.rx-modal-content.blog-form-row .row-content{width:275px;float:{vb:stylevar left};margin-top:10px;}

		.rx-modal.file-chooser .b-button, html.fileinput .file-chooser span.custom-upload-button{
			display:inline-block;
			height:24px;
			width:auto;
			padding:0;
			font-size:12px !important;
		}

	}

	<vb:comment>
	/* profile conversation style */
	</vb:comment>
	@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
		#profileTabs .conversation-list .list-item .post-header .post-action-wrapper{padding-{vb:stylevar right}:10px;}
		.conversation-list .list-item-header .info .post-date{margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0 !important}
		.conversation-list .list-item-header .info.h-right,
		.conversation-list .list-item-header .checkbox.h-right {
			padding: 5px 0 0 0;
			float: {vb:stylevar left};
			width: 90%;
		}

		.conversation-list.stream-view .list-item-header .avatar {
			margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 10px;
		}

		<vb:comment>
		/* since markup difference between page implementations, need extra rules */
		</vb:comment>
		#activity-stream-tab .conversation-list .list-item-header .info.h-right{margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0;}
	}

	<vb:comment>
	/* ckeditor overflow issue on iphone portrait - New Topic and Blog edit description fields */
	</vb:comment>
	@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
		#cke_ckeditor-bare > span{overflow:hidden;}
		#cke_ckeditor-bare-edit > span{overflow:hidden;}
	}

	<vb:comment>
	/* Blog (page):Latest Comments (widget) - width needs to decrease with shrinking viewport */
	</vb:comment>
	@media only screen and (max-width:1225px) {
		.list-container .list-item .list-item-body .conversation_slider .photo_container {width:100%;}
	}

	<vb:comment>
	/* User Profile's edit subscriber page section-1 widget (subscriptions,subscribers,groups) */
	</vb:comment>
	@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
	}

	<vb:comment>
	/* User Profile's edit subscriber page subscriptions,subscribers,groups list - reduce padding at smaller view */
	</vb:comment>
	@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
		.b-layout--contiguous .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list .subscription-item .td.first_column{padding-left:7px !important;padding-right:0px !important;}
		.b-layout--contiguous .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list .subscription-item .td.second_column{padding-left:7px !important;padding-right:0px !important;}
		.b-layout--contiguous .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list .subscription-item .td.third_column{padding-left:7px !important;padding-right:7px !important;}
	}

	<vb:comment>
	/* groups tab */
	</vb:comment>
	div#groupsTab{padding:5px !important;}
	@media only screen and (min-width:767px) {

		.ui-corner-all, .ui-corner-bottom, .ui-corner-right, .ui-corner-br{border-bottom-right-radius:0;}
		.ui-corner-all, .ui-corner-bottom, .ui-corner-left, .ui-corner-bl{border-bottom-left-radius:0;}

	}

	<vb:comment>
	/* chrome,safari (but not opera) style overrides */
	</vb:comment>
	html.no-firefox.no-opera .subscribersContent,
	html.no-firefox.no-opera .subscriptionsContent{margin-{vb:stylevar right}:-2px;}
	/* exclude IE8 */
	html.no-firefox.no-opera body.ie8 .subscribersContent,
	html.no-firefox.no-opera body.ie8 .subscriptionsContent{margin-{vb:stylevar right}:0;}

	@media only screen and (min-width:550px) and (max-width:1050px) {
		html.no-firefox.no-opera .subscribersContent,
		html.no-firefox.no-opera .subscriptionsContent{margin-right:-3px !important;}
	}

<vb:comment>
	/**
	 *
	 *	conversation toolbar
	 *	style for mobile versus desktop
	 *
	 **/
</vb:comment>
	@media only screen and (max-width:990px) {

		<vb:comment>
		/* hide  left (button) container and search - both copied and displayed on new toolbar row */
		</vb:comment>
		.conversation-view > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper > .conversation-toolbar.desktop > ul.toolset-left{display:none;}
		.conversation-view > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper > .conversation-toolbar.desktop > ul.toolset-right > li.toolbar-search{display:none;}

		<vb:comment>
		/* show mobile toolbar, search and buttons */
		</vb:comment>
		.conversation-view > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper > .conversation-toolbar.mobile-search{display:block !important;}
		.conversation-view > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper > .conversation-toolbar.mobile-search li.toolbar-search {display: block;}
		.conversation-view > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper > .conversation-toolbar.mobile-search li.post-buttonset {display: block;}

		<vb:comment>
		/* remove pagenav (pagination) background */
		</vb:comment>
		.conversation-view > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper > .conversation-toolbar.desktop > ul.toolset-right > li.toolbar-pagenav{background:none;}

		<vb:comment>
		/* filter options: display vertically and remove border-left */
		</vb:comment>
		.conversation-toolbar-wrapper .toolbar-filter-overlay .filter-options-list > li,
		.toolbar-wrapper .toolbar-filter-overlay .filter-options-list > li {
			display:block;border-{vb:stylevar left}:none;
		}

		<vb:comment>
		/* resize search */
		</vb:comment>
		.conversation-view > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper > .conversation-toolbar.mobile-search > ul.toolset-right > li.toolbar-search div.search-container{width:159px;}
		.conversation-view > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper > .conversation-toolbar.mobile-search > ul.toolset-right > li.toolbar-search div.search-container input{width:121px;}

		<vb:comment>
		/* resize pagination arrows */
		</vb:comment>
		.conversation-view > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper > .conversation-toolbar.desktop > ul.toolset-right > li.toolbar-pagenav div.horizontal-arrows{width:112px;}
		.conversation-view > .conversation-toolbar-wrapper > .conversation-toolbar.desktop > ul.toolset-right > li.toolbar-pagenav div.horizontal-arrows a{width:55px;}
		.widget-tabs-panel .conversation-toolbar-wrapper > .conversation-toolbar > ul.toolset-right > li.toolbar-pagenav div.horizontal-arrows{width:82px;}
		.widget-tabs-panel .conversation-toolbar-wrapper > .conversation-toolbar > ul.toolset-right > li.toolbar-pagenav div.horizontal-arrows a{width:35px;}
		ul.toolset.h-right > li.pagenav-controls div.horizontal-arrows{width:71px;} 	<vb:comment>/* profile notifications: arrows 35px wide, x2 = 70px + 1px border = 71px */</vb:comment>
		ul.toolset.h-right > li.pagenav-controls div.horizontal-arrows a{width:35px;}

	}

<vb:comment>Tiny scrollbars jQuery plugin styles</vb:comment>
.viewport {
	overflow: hidden;
	position: relative;
}
.viewport .overview {
	padding: 0;
	margin: 0;
	position: relative;
	{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
	top: 0;
}
.scrollbar {
	position: relative;
	margin: 20px 0 0;
	clear: both;
	height: 4px;
}
.scrollbar .track {
	height:4px;
	position: relative;
	background:#000;
	-moz-border-radius: 2px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 2px;
	border-radius: 2px;
}
.scrollbar .thumb {
	width:14px;
	height: 14px;
	cursor: pointer;
	position: absolute;
	{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
	top: 50%;
	margin-top:-7px;
	background: transparent url(images/css/sprite_icons_{vb:stylevar textdirection}.png) no-repeat scroll 0 -144px;
}
.scrollbar.disable {
	visibility: hidden;
}
<vb:comment>End Tiny scrollbars jQuery plugin styles</vb:comment>

	margin:5px 0 10px 0;
	padding:8px 8px 8px 0;
}
.channel-config-dialog .add-channel-container label {
	font-weight:bold;
}
.searchFields_tag .tag-input,
.autocomplete-container input{
	width:auto !important;
	padding-top: 0;
	padding-bottom: 0;
}
.searchSwitchToAdvanced label, .searchSwitchToForm label {
	cursor:pointer;
	color: #4682B4;
	text-decoration: none;
}
.advancedSearchFields .searchFields_searchJSON {
	width:70%;
	height:100px;
}
.channel-config-dialog .add-channel-container .add-channel-fieldset input{
	width:80%;
}
.advancedSearchFields .add-search-container .add-search-fieldset input.short{
	width:200px;
}
.advancedSearchFields .tag-box .tag{
	margin-top:0px;
	margin-bottom:0px;
}

#tag-box-searchFields_tag .tag{
	margin-top: 0;
}
.channel-config-dialog .add-channel-container .add-channel-fieldset button ,
.advancedSearchFields .add-search-container .add-search-fieldset button {
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0;
	margin-{vb:stylevar right}:0;
}
.advancedSearchFields .add-search-container .add-search-container {
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}:20px;
}
.advancedSearchFields .add-search-container .add-search-fieldset input[type="checkbox"],
.advancedSearchFields .add-search-container .add-search-fieldset select,
.advancedSearchFields .add-search-container .add-search-fieldset input[type="radio"]{
	width:auto;
}

.channel-config-dialog .channel-list {
<vb:comment>
ghartling: Setting min-height to !important to override a mysterious
duplicate rule that shows up elsewhere in the CSS that I was unable to track down.
</vb:comment>
	min-height:0px !important;
	overflow-y:auto;
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container {
	border:1px dotted #868686;
	/*min-height:87px;*/
	margin-bottom:10px;
	margin-{vb:stylevar right}:2px;
	padding-top:5px;
	background:{vb:stylevar inline_edit_background};
	overflow-x:auto;
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .channel-item-highlight {
	min-height:32px;
	text-align:{vb:stylevar left};
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container > .grip-icon {
	margin:-3px 0 0 1px;
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .channel-item-container .channel-item,
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .channel-item-highlight {
	background: #EFF3F8;
	border: 1px solid #B0C4DE;
	margin: 0 0 8px 15px;
	padding: 0 5px;
	width:530px;
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container .channel-item .grip-icon {
	margin-top:2px;
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container .channel-item .close-button {
	margin-top:6px;
}

.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .channel-item .add-subchannel-button,
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .channel-item .channel-to-category,
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .channel-item .category-to-channel {
	font-weight: bold;
	height: 16px;
	margin: 6px 5px;
	float:{vb:stylevar right};
}

.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .channel-item .add-subchannel-button {
	width: 16px;
	text-align: center;
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .channel-item .add-subchannel-button a {
	color:#2E8AE6;
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container-highlight,
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container .channel-item-highlight {
	border-style:dashed;
	background:transparent;
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container-highlight {
	border-color:#FFF;
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container .sub-channel-container {
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}:30px;
	min-height:10px;
}/*
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container .sub-channel-container .channel-item,
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container .sub-channel-container .channel-item-highlight {
	width:95.98%;
}*/
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .channel-item .channel-title {
	float: {vb:stylevar left};
	min-height: 16px;
	line-height: 16px;
	margin: 5px;
	font-size:12px;
	width:322px;
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container .channel-item .channel-title div {
	font-weight:normal;
	min-height:18px;
	line-height:18px;
	border:1px dashed transparent;
	cursor:text;
	color:#222;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container .channel-item .channel-title div:hover {
	border-color:#C0C0C0;
}
.channel-config-dialog .channel-list .main-channel-container .channel-item .channel-title input {
	width:100%;
	display:none;
	padding:0;
}
.channel-config-dialog .dialog-content {
	min-height:294px;
}
.channel-config-dialog-container.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar-close {
	display:none;
}
ul.widget-channel-list li {
	line-height:20px;
	height:auto;
}
ul.widget-channel-list li ul {
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}:20px;
}
ul.widget-channel-list li span {
	font-weight:bold;
}
/*End Channel Widget*/
/*Page Editor*/
#page-editor-dialog {

}
.page-editor-dialog-container.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar-close {

}
#page-editor-dialog .dialog-content .page-editor-text {

	height:25px;

}
#page-editor-dialog .dialog-content .tabs {

}

#edit-page-dropdown .panel .panel-header-text,

#edit-navbar .panel .panel-header-text,
.config-site-panel .panel .panel-header-text,

}

}

#edit-navbar,
#manage-page {
	position:relative;
}
#edit-navbar .panel .panel-header-text,
#manage-page .panel .panel-header-text{
	line-height: 16px;
}
#navbar-edit-item {
	padding: 30px;
}
#navbar-edit-item .dialog-content {
	margin-bottom: 0;
}
#navbar-edit-item .blockrow > label,
#navbar-edit-item .blockrow > input {
	display:block;
}
#navbar-edit-url {
	margin-bottom:5px;
}
#navbar-edit-usergroups-dialog .dialog-body .blockrow {
	margin-bottom:4px;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list {
	padding:5px 0;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list li {
	line-height: 24px;
	cursor: move;
	border-bottom:1px dotted #2F3841;
	color: {vb:stylevar body_link_color};
	text-decoration: {vb:stylevar body_link_decoration};
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list li:first-child {
	border-top:1px dotted #2F3841;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list li.selected {
	background: transparent url("images/css/bckg_areaheader.png") repeat;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list li > label {
	margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 5px;
	cursor:move;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list li.ui-sortable-helper {
	background-color:#ECF9FD;
	padding-{vb:stylevar left}:5px;
	border:1px solid #888383;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list .nav-item-controls {
	color: #C0C0C0;
	font-size: 16px;
	line-height: 21px;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list .nav-item-controls > span {
	display: inline-block;
	margin: 0 5px;
	position: relative;
	cursor: pointer;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list .nav-item-controls > .navbar-item-delete {
	background: transparent url("images/css/sprite_icons_vb_{vb:stylevar textdirection}.png") no-repeat scroll -112px -176px;
	width:13px;
	height:16px;
	top:4px;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list .nav-item-controls > .navbar-item-edit {
	background: transparent url("images/css/sprite_icons_vb_{vb:stylevar textdirection}.png") no-repeat scroll -224px -80px;
	width:12px;
	height:15px;
	top:5px;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list .nav-item-controls > .navbar-item-opensubnav {
	background: transparent url("images/css/sprite_icons_vb_{vb:stylevar textdirection}.png") no-repeat scroll -127px -45px;
	width:8px;
	height:16px;
	top:4px;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list li.selected .nav-item-controls > .navbar-item-opensubnav {
	background-position:-135px -45px;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list.footer .nav-item-controls > .navbar-item-edit + i,
#edit-navbar .navbar-list.footer .nav-item-controls > .navbar-item-opensubnav {
	display:none;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list.footer .nav-item-controls > .navbar-item-edit + i,
#edit-navbar .navbar-list.footer .nav-item-controls > .navbar-item-opensubnav,
#edit-navbar .sub-navbar-list .nav-item-controls > .navbar-item-edit + i,
#edit-navbar .sub-navbar-list .nav-item-controls > .navbar-item-opensubnav {
	display:none;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-list li.sortable-highlight {
	border:2px dashed #AEAEAE;
	background: transparent;
	margin-top:0;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:11px;
	line-height:22px;
	font-weight:bold;
	color:#AEAEAE;
}
#edit-navbar .new-nav-item {
	background: {vb:stylevar body_link_color};
	text-decoration: {vb:stylevar body_link_decoration};
	color: #FFF;
	font-size: 12px;
	font-weight: bold;
	height: 24px;
	line-height: 24px;
	text-align: center;
	cursor:pointer;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	border-radius: 3px;
}
#edit-navbar .navbar-ui-wrapper,
#edit-navbar .subnavbar-ui-wrapper,

	float: {vb:stylevar left};

 border: 0;

<vb:comment>
Remove filter to avoid IE9 border-radius and background gradient bleeding bug.
This occurs in all custom dropdowns but only noticeable when dropdown is in a container with a dark background color or image like in Sitebuilder
So let's remove the filter in the custom dropdowns in Sitebuilder.
</vb:comment>
.ie9.edit-mode #sitebuilder-wrapper .custom-dropdown,
.ie9.edit-mode .sb-dialog .custom-dropdown {
	filter:none;
}

<vb:comment>Custom DataTable CSS for Header Ads</vb:comment>
.dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_filter {
	float: none;
	padding-bottom: 42px;
	text-align: left;
	width: auto;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_filter .axdfilter {
	width: 190px;
	font-weight: normal;
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 5px;
	margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 3px;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .dataTables_filter label {
	font-weight:bold;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable {
	border-width: 0 0 1px;
	border-color: #3B444D;
	border-spacing:0;
	border-collapse:separate;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable th.axd-cell {
	border-bottom: 1px solid #242B33;
	border-top:0;
	height:28px;
	outline:none;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .axd-cell,
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .dataTables_empty {
	border-top: 1px solid #3B444D;
	padding: 2px 10px;
	background:transparent;
	height:24px;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable tr .axd-cell:first-child {
	padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable tr {
	background:transparent;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .axdtable-title {
	width:60%;
	text-align:{vb:stylevar left};
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .axdtable-active {
	width:5%;
	text-align:center;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .axdtable-display-order {
	width:20%;
	text-align:center;
	white-space:nowrap;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .axdtable-display-order input {
	width:40px;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .axdtable-action {
	width:15%;
	text-align:center;
	white-space:nowrap;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .axdtable-action .editlink > span {
	background:transparent url("images/css/sprite_icons_{vb:stylevar textdirection}.png") no-repeat scroll -64px 0;
	width:24px;
	height:24px;
	display:inline-block;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .axdtable-action .editlink > span:hover {
	background-position:-96px 0;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .axdtable-action .deletelink > span {
	background:transparent url("images/css/sprite_icons_{vb:stylevar textdirection}.png") no-repeat scroll -128px 0;
	width:24px;
	height:24px;
	display:inline-block;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .axdtable-action .deletelink > span:hover {
	background-position:-160px 0;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .sorting_disabled {
	cursor:default;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .axd-cell > span {
	background:transparent url("images/css/sprite_icons_{vb:stylevar textdirection}.png") no-repeat scroll -160px -32px;
	width:16px;
	height:16px;
	display:inline-block;
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}:5px;
	position:relative;
	top:3px;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .axd-cell.sorting > span {
	display:none;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .sorting_asc > span {
	background-position:-160px -32px;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .sorting_asc > span:hover {
	background-position:-192px -32px;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .sorting_desc > span {
	background-position:-96px -32px;
}
.dataTables_wrapper .axdtable .sorting_desc > span:hover {
	background-position:-128px -32px;
}

<vb:comment>End Custom DataTable CSS</vb:comment>

.js-style-panel .warning
{
	background-color: inherit;
	color: #ff3333;
	border:none;
}
.sb-style-panel_cssextraedit
{
	width: 700px;
	height: 300px;
}

<vb:comment>
/**
* UN-RESET
*
* These definitions are designed to undo the effects of CSS Reset, but only when contained within a *.reset element.
* Code is based on YUI Base
*/
</vb:comment>
/*
Copyright (c) 2009, Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved.
Code licensed under the BSD License:
http://developer.yahoo.net/yui/license.txt
version: 2.7.0
*/
/**
 * YUI Base
 * @module base
 * @namespace yui-
 * @requires reset, fonts
*/
.restore body {
	<vb:comment>/* For breathing room between content and viewport. */</vb:comment>
	margin:10px;
}
.restore h1 {
	<vb:comment>/* 18px via YUI Fonts CSS foundation. */</vb:comment>
	font-size: 138.5%;
}
.restore h2 {
	<vb:comment>/* 16px via YUI Fonts CSS foundation. */</vb:comment>
	font-size: 123.1%;
}
.restore h3 {
	<vb:comment>/* 14px via YUI Fonts CSS foundation. */</vb:comment>
	font-size: 108%;
}
.restore h1,
.restore h2,
.restore h3 {
	<vb:comment>/* Top & bottom margin based on font size. */</vb:comment>
	margin: 1em 0;
}
.restore h1,
.restore h2,
.restore h3,
.restore h4,
.restore h5,
.restore h6,
.restore strong,
.restore dt,
.restore b {
	<vb:comment>/* Bringing boldness back to headers and the strong element. */</vb:comment>
	font-weight: bold;
}
.restore i {
	font-style:italic;
}
.restore u {
	text-decoration:underline;
}
.restore optgroup {
	font-weight:normal;
}
.restore abbr,
.restore acronym {
	<vb:comment>/* Indicating to users that more info is available. */</vb:comment>
	border-bottom: 1px dotted {vb:stylevar post_controls_divider_color};
	cursor: help;
}
.restore em {
	<vb:comment>/* Bringing italics back to the em element. */</vb:comment>
	font-style: italic;
}
.restore del {
	<vb:comment>/* Striking deleted phrases. */</vb:comment>
	text-decoration: line-through;
}
.restore blockquote,
.restore ul,
.restore ol,
.restore dl {
	<vb:comment>/* Giving blockquotes and lists room to breath. */</vb:comment>
	margin: 1em;
}
.restore ol,
.restore ul,
.restore dl {
	<vb:comment>/* Bringing lists on to the page with breathing room. */</vb:comment>
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 2em;
}
.restore ol > li,
.restore ol.decimal > li {
	list-style:decimal outside;
}
.restore ol.upper-roman > li {
	list-style:upper-roman outside;
}
.restore ol.lower-roman > li {
	list-style:lower-roman outside;
}
.restore ol.upper-alpha > li {
	list-style:upper-alpha outside;
}
.restore ol.lower-alpha > li {
	list-style:lower-alpha outside;
}
.restore ul > li {
	<vb:comment>/* Giving UL's LIs generated disc markers. */</vb:comment>
	list-style: disc outside;
}
.restore dl dd {
	<vb:comment>/* Giving UL's LIs generated numbers. */</vb:comment>
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 1em;
}
.restore th,
.restore td {
	<vb:comment>/* Borders and padding to make the table readable. */</vb:comment>
	border: 1px solid {vb:stylevar post_controls_divider_color};
	padding: 0.5em;
}
.restore th {
	<vb:comment>/* Distinguishing table headers from data cells. */</vb:comment>
	font-weight: bold;
	text-align: center;
}
.restore caption {
	<vb:comment>/* Coordinated margin to match cell's padding. */</vb:comment>
	margin-bottom: .5em;
	<vb:comment>/* Centered so it doesn't blend in to other content. */</vb:comment>
	text-align: center;
}
.restore sup {
	<vb:comment>/* to preserve line-height and selector appearance */</vb:comment>
	vertical-align: super;
	font-size: smaller;
}
.restore sub {
	<vb:comment>/* to preserve line-height and selector appearance */</vb:comment>
	vertical-align: sub;
	font-size: smaller;
}
.restore p,
.restore fieldset,
.restore table,
.restore pre {
	<vb:comment>/* So things don't run into each other. */</vb:comment>
	margin-bottom: 1em;
}
<vb:comment>
/* Opera requires 1px of padding to render with contemporary native chrome */
</vb:comment>
.restore button,
.restore input[type="checkbox"],
.restore input[type="radio"],
.restore input[type="reset"],
.restore input[type="submit"] {
	padding:1px;
}

This template expects the following variables: $channel .htmltitle String Use vb:raw. Caller must ensure this is clean. Parent templates should never allow for this value to be replaced by a user value .routeid Int Use vb:var .nodeid Int Use vb:var .filedataid Int Use vb:var (This is the filedataid of the channel icon) .description String Use vb:var .channeltype String Use vb:var {vb:set channel, {vb:raw conversation}} {vb:set title, {vb:raw channel.htmltitle}} {vb:set url, {vb:url {vb:raw channel.routeid}, {vb:raw channel}}} Text data usage notes: * Use vb:raw for title, since htmltitle should already be escaped and we don't want to double escape it. * Use vb:raw for url, since it's generated internally and should already be conformant for URLs * Use vb:var for channel.description, because the value in DB may contain HTML, and since the other pages that display description (e.x. a group's page in the @id=groupAbout section) also do not allow unescaped HTML. * Use vb:var for channel.channeltype, while it's provided internally and should never contain HTML, it also doesn't hurt to and we don't have to worry about double-escaping since it should never contain HTML.

That setting doesn't hide channel icons when the user goes to a group page for ex, so it does not make sense to use it here. Note 2: I'm not sure if we'll ever want channel-icons to behave differently in terms of css from avatars in this kind of context, so I'll keep the 'avatar' css classes in this template.
    Use one of the default icons. <vb:if condition="!isset($prefixsets)">
	{vb:data prefixsets, prefix, fetch, {vb:raw channelid}}
</vb:if>

<vb:if condition="$prefixsets">
	<select name="prefixid" class="prefixid">
		<option value=""<vb:if condition="empty($conversation['prefixid'])"> selected="selected"</vb:if>>{vb:phrase no_prefix_meta}</option>
		<vb:if condition="count($prefixsets) > 1">
			<vb:each from="prefixsets" key="prefixsetid" value="prefixset">
				{vb:set prefixsetvarname, 'prefixset_'}
				{vb:strcat prefixsetvarname, {vb:raw prefixsetid}}
				{vb:strcat prefixsetvarname, '_title'}
				<optgroup label="{vb:phrase {vb:raw prefixsetvarname}}">
					<vb:each from="prefixset" key="prefixid" value="prefix">
						{vb:set prefixvarname, 'prefix_'}
						{vb:strcat prefixvarname, {vb:raw prefixid}}
						{vb:strcat prefixvarname, '_title_plain'}
						<option value="{vb:raw prefixid}"<vb:if condition="$prefixid == $conversation['prefixid']"> selected="selected"</vb:if>>{vb:phrase {vb:raw prefixvarname}}</option>
					</vb:each>
				</optgroup>
			</vb:each>
		<vb:else />
			<vb:each from="prefixsets" key="prefixsetid" value="prefixset">
				<vb:each from="prefixset" key="prefixid" value="prefix">
					{vb:set prefixvarname, 'prefix_'}
					{vb:strcat prefixvarname, {vb:raw prefixid}}
					{vb:strcat prefixvarname, '_title_plain'}
					<option value="{vb:raw prefixid}"<vb:if condition="$prefixid == $conversation['prefixid']"> selected="selected"</vb:if>>{vb:phrase {vb:raw prefixvarname}}</option>
				</vb:each>
			</vb:each>
		</vb:if>
	</select>
</vb:if>

templategroup.name: Search
templategroup.template:
Excluded Words

What it does: excludes search results with a particular word or phrase
What to type: bass -fishing
What you'll get: results about bass that are not related to fishing

Multiple Words

What it does: searches for webpages that include either word
What to type: vacation London OR Paris
What you'll get: results with the word "vacation" and either "London" or "Paris"

{vb:cssExtra css_form.css}

<vb:comment>***** DISPLAY COLUMN 2 *****</vb:comment>
<vb:if condition="$displayColumns == 'column_2'">

	{vb:set idx, 1}
	<vb:each from="nodes" value="node">

		{vb:set inchannelTemplateName, 'display_contenttype_conversationreply_'}
		{vb:strcat inchannelTemplateName, {vb:raw node.content.contenttypeclass}}

		<vb:if condition="!($idx % 2)">
			{vb:set addLiClass, 'b-post-column__two b-post-column__two--second'}
		<vb:else />
			{vb:set addLiClass, 'b-post-column__two b-post-column__two--first'}
		</vb:if>
		{vb:set idx, {vb:math {vb:raw idx} + 1}}

		{vb:template {vb:raw inchannelTemplateName},
			conversation={vb:raw node.content},
			reportActivity=1,
			currentNodeIsArticle=1,
			addLiClass={vb:raw addLiClass}}

	</vb:each>

<vb:comment>***** DISPLAY COLUMN 3 *****</vb:comment>
<vb:elseif condition="$displayColumns == 'column_3'" />

	{vb:set idx, 1}
	<vb:each from="nodes" value="node">

		{vb:set inchannelTemplateName, 'display_contenttype_conversationreply_'}
		{vb:strcat inchannelTemplateName, {vb:raw node.content.contenttypeclass}}

		<vb:if condition="$idx == 1">
			{vb:set addLiClass, 'b-post-column__three b-post-column__three--first'}
		<vb:elseif condition="$idx == 2" />
			{vb:set addLiClass, 'b-post-column__three b-post-column__three--second'}
		<vb:else />
			{vb:set addLiClass, 'b-post-column__three b-post-column__three--third'}
		</vb:if>
		{vb:set idx, {vb:math {vb:raw idx} + 1}}
		<vb:if condition="$idx > 3">
			{vb:set idx, 1}
		</vb:if>

		{vb:template {vb:raw inchannelTemplateName},
			conversation={vb:raw node.content},
			reportActivity=1,
			currentNodeIsArticle=1,
			addLiClass={vb:raw addLiClass}}

	</vb:each>

<vb:comment>***** DISPLAY COLUMN 1x2 *****</vb:comment>
<vb:elseif condition="$displayColumns == 'column_1x2'" />

	{vb:set idx, 0}
	<vb:each from="nodes" value="node">

		{vb:set inchannelTemplateName, 'display_contenttype_conversationreply_'}
		{vb:strcat inchannelTemplateName, {vb:raw node.content.contenttypeclass}}

		<vb:if condition="$idx == 0">
			{vb:set addLiClass, ''}
		<vb:elseif condition="!($idx % 2)" />
			{vb:set addLiClass, 'b-post-column__two b-post-column__two--second'}
		<vb:else />
			{vb:set addLiClass, 'b-post-column__two b-post-column__two--first'}
		</vb:if>
		{vb:set idx, {vb:math {vb:raw idx} + 1}}

		{vb:template {vb:raw inchannelTemplateName},
			conversation={vb:raw node.content},
			reportActivity=1,
			currentNodeIsArticle=1,
			addLiClass={vb:raw addLiClass}}

	</vb:each>

<vb:comment>***** DISPLAY COLUMN 1x3 *****</vb:comment>
<vb:elseif condition="$displayColumns == 'column_1x3'" />

	{vb:set idx, 0}
	<vb:each from="nodes" value="node">

		{vb:set inchannelTemplateName, 'display_contenttype_conversationreply_'}
		{vb:strcat inchannelTemplateName, {vb:raw node.content.contenttypeclass}}

		<vb:if condition="$idx == 0">
			{vb:set addLiClass, ''}
		<vb:elseif condition="$idx == 1" />
			{vb:set addLiClass, 'b-post-column__three b-post-column__three--first'}
		<vb:elseif condition="$idx == 2" />
			{vb:set addLiClass, 'b-post-column__three b-post-column__three--second'}
		<vb:else />
			{vb:set addLiClass, 'b-post-column__three b-post-column__three--third'}
		</vb:if>
		{vb:set idx, {vb:math {vb:raw idx} + 1}}
		<vb:if condition="$idx > 3">
			{vb:set idx, 1}
		</vb:if>

		{vb:template {vb:raw inchannelTemplateName},
			conversation={vb:raw node.content},
			reportActivity=1,
			currentNodeIsArticle=1,
			addLiClass={vb:raw addLiClass}}

	</vb:each>

<vb:comment>***** DISPLAY COLUMN 2x1 *****</vb:comment>
<vb:elseif condition="$displayColumns == 'column_2x1'" />

	{vb:set idx, 1}
	<vb:each from="nodes" value="node">

		{vb:set inchannelTemplateName, 'display_contenttype_conversationreply_'}
		{vb:strcat inchannelTemplateName, {vb:raw node.content.contenttypeclass}}

		<vb:if condition="$idx == 1">
			{vb:set addLiClass, 'b-post-column__two b-post-column__two--first'}
		<vb:elseif condition="$idx == 2" />
			{vb:set addLiClass, 'b-post-column__two b-post-column__two--second'}
		<vb:else />
			{vb:set addLiClass, ''}
		</vb:if>
		{vb:set idx, {vb:math {vb:raw idx} + 1}}

		{vb:template {vb:raw inchannelTemplateName},
			conversation={vb:raw node.content},
			reportActivity=1,
			currentNodeIsArticle=1,
			addLiClass={vb:raw addLiClass}}

	</vb:each>

<vb:comment>***** DISPLAY COLUMN 1 (default) *****</vb:comment>
<vb:else />

	<vb:each from="nodes" value="node">
		{vb:set inchannelTemplateName, 'display_contenttype_conversationreply_'}
		{vb:strcat inchannelTemplateName, {vb:raw node.content.contenttypeclass}}
		{vb:template {vb:raw inchannelTemplateName},
			conversation={vb:raw node.content},
			reportActivity=1,
			currentNodeIsArticle=1}
	</vb:each>

</vb:if>

Side arrow navigation /* WARNING: Keep the "jssor-dummy-class" at the end of the class attribute. Jssor apparently adds their "av" and "dn" classes by smacking them on the end of the className instead of adding them as separate classes. By adding an unused dummy class at the end, we keep this behavior from affecting the other classes. */ {vb:set textdirection, {vb:stylevar textdirection}} {vb:set leftClass, 'jssora03l'} {vb:set rightClass, 'jssora03r'} {vb:set leftClass, 'jssora03r'} {vb:set rightClass, 'jssora03l'} Bottom bullet navigation
/* DO NOT remove or add any classes after the "b-content-slider__bullet" class without adjusting the rules in css_b_content_slider.css. Jssor apparently adds their "av" and "dn" classes by smacking it on the end of the className instead of adding it as a separate class. We don't use a dummy class at the end because we actually want to style it in the av and dn states.*/
{vb:js js/jquery/jssor/jssor.slider.mini.js, js/content-slider.js}
